ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًا وَهُم بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمْ كَٰفِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who bar access to the way of Allah desiring to make it crooked and reject the Next Woeld.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who obstruct others from the way of God and seek obliquity in it, and do not believe in the life to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: upon those who bar people from the way of Allah, and seek in it crookedness, and disbelieve in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who prevent others from the way of God, seek to make it appear crooked, and who have no faith in the life hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who prevent from the way of Allah and wish deviation in it; and it is they who disbelieve in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who hinder (others) from the path of Allah, and seek a crookedness therein, while they are disbelievers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who turn away from the path of Allah and desire to make it crooked; and they are disbelievers in the hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who bar from God's way, desiring to make it crooked; they disbelieve in the world to come;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who debar (men) from the way of Allah and would have it crooked, and who are disbelievers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Such as those who turn others away from the path of God and seek to make it appear crooked: these are the ones who deny the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who hinder others from the way of Allah and would seek crockedness therein, and they: in the Hereafter they are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who bar [others] from the way of Allah, and seek to make it crooked, and disbelieve in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who would hinder (men) from the path of Allah and would seek in it something crooked: these were they who denied the Hereafter!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who hinder (others) from the Path of Allah (Islamic Monotheism), and seek a crookedness therein, while they are disbelievers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who bar others from the Path of Allah and seek to make it crooked, they disbelieve in the Everlasting Life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who hinder others from the path of God, and seek to make it crooked; and regarding the Hereafter, they are in denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who averted [people] from the way of Allah and sought to make it [seem] deviant while they, concerning the Hereafter, were disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:19] they who bar [people] from God’s way, [from] the religion of Islam, desiring [to have] it, seeking that the   way be, crooked; and in the Hereafter they (hum, ‘they’, is [reiterated] for emphasis) are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who debar (men)) who prevent people (from the way of Allah) from Allah's religion and obedience (and would have it crooked) they would have it deviated from the Truth; it is also said that this means: they would have it other than what it is, (and who are disbelievers in) deniers of (the Hereafter) resurrection after death. 228
